# data.utils.read_json { #easyaligner.data.utils.read_json }

```python
data.utils.read_json(json_path)
```

Convenience function to read a JSON file and parse it into an `AudioMetadata` object.

For better performance, use `JSONMetadataDataset` in `easyaligner.data.dataset`.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

+-----------+-------------+------------------------+------------+
| Name      | Type        | Description            | Default    |
+===========+=============+========================+============+
| json_path | str or Path | Path to the JSON file. | _required_ |
+-----------+-------------+------------------------+------------+

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

+--------+---------------+------------------------------+
| Name   | Type          | Description                  |
+========+===============+==============================+
|        | AudioMetadata | Parsed AudioMetadata object. |
+--------+---------------+------------------------------+
